2025-05-07.title: Tesla’s China Sales Drop Again as Rival BYD Posts Gains
2025-05-07.description: Tesla Inc.’s China-made shipments declined for a seventh consecutive month, exacerbating a slump in the electric vehicle maker’s global sales.

2025-05-02.title: BYD Post Best Month of Sales Yet in 2025 With Pure EVs a Hit
2025-05-02.description: BYD Co. posted its best month of sales yet for 2025, a further sign the Chinese carmaking juggernaut is on track to hit its full-year target of 5.5 million deliveries.
